mapper.select: select a.id as id, a.order_id as orderId, a.carId as "car.id", a.unit as "unit.id", a.member_id as "member.id", a.type as "type.id", a.startmiles as startmiles, a.endmiles as endmiles, a.position as position, a.status as status, a.startdate as startdate, a.enddate as enddate from lease a left join cars c on a.carId = c.id left join type t on a.type = t.id left join unit u on a.unit = u.id where a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into lease( id, order_id, carId, unit, member_id, type, amount, startmiles, endmiles, position, status, startdate, enddate ) values ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{car.id}, #{unit.id}, #{member.id}, #{type.id}, #{amount}, #{startmiles}, #{endmiles}, #{position}, #{status}, #{startdate}, #{enddate} )
mapper.update: update lease set order_id = #{orderId}, carId = #{car.id}, unit = #{unit.id}, member_id = #{member.id}, type = #{type.id}, amount = #{amount}, startmiles = #{startmiles}, endmiles = #{endmiles}, position = #{position}, status = #{status}, startdate = #{startdate}, enddate = #{enddate} where id = #{id}
